text: Christian Louis Ntsay (born 27 March 1961) is a Malagasy politician. In June 2018, he became Prime Minister of Madagascar. He was appointed by President Hery Rajaonarimampianina. Ntsay worked for the United Nations. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Prime ministers of Madagascar
title: Christian Ntsay
